statements: SELECT platform_name, impressions, clicks FROM advertising_data;
SELECT ad_campaign_name, revenue FROM advertising_data WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM advertising_data WHERE ad_campaign_id = 'c748cc1e-5d2e-4c05-b552-df1f08cbe4eb';
SELECT platform_name, clicks, revenue FROM advertising_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT platform_name, ad_campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM advertising_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT platform_name, impressions, revenue FROM advertising_data WHERE platform_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM advertising_data WHERE ad_campaign_id = '1f527f16-2d17-4b5e-a595-157b8b29fa75' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT platform_name, ad_campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM advertising_data WHERE conversions > 5 AND impressions <= 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT platform_name, ad_campaign_id FROM advertising_data WHERE revenue > 500.50 ORDER BY clicks ASC, impressions DESC;

SELECT platform_name, ad_campaign_name, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM advertising_data GROUP BY platform_name, ad_campaign_name HAVING total_clicks > 1000 ORDER BY average_revenue DESC;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, impressions, clicks, revenue FROM platform_data;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, campaign_id FROM campaign_data;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, clicks, impressions, revenue FROM platform_data ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, clicks FROM platform_data WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT platform_name, clicks FROM platform_data
SELECT * FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT platform_name, revenue FROM platform_data ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT platform_name, impressions, clicks, revenue FROM platform_data WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions
SELECT ad_name, ad_clicks FROM PlatformA_AdData;
SELECT ad_id, ad_impressions, ad_platform FROM PlatformB_AdData ORDER BY ad_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlatformC_AdData WHERE ad_cost > 100;
SELECT ad_platform, ad_id FROM PlatformA_AdData WHERE ad_clicks < 50;
SELECT ad_name, ad_conversions FROM PlatformB_AdData;
SELECT * FROM PlatformA_AdData ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC, ad_impressions ASC, ad_name;
SELECT ad_name, ad_platform, ad_clicks FROM PlatformB_AdData WHERE ad_clicks > 100 AND ad_impressions < 500 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_impressions, ad_cost FROM PlatformC_AdData WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC, ad_impressions ASC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_clicks, ad_impressions FROM PlatformA_AdData WHERE ad_clicks > 50 AND ad_impressions > 1000 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_clicks, ad_impressions, ad_cost FROM PlatformC_AdData WHERE ad_impressions > 5000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC, ad_impressions ASC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_platforms;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM advertising_platforms;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, impressions, conversions FROM ads WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT performance_id, ad_id, impressions, spend FROM ad_performance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_type FROM advertising_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, spend FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Video' ORDER BY spend DESC;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id;

SELECT platform_name, campaign_name, date, clicks FROM advertising_platforms JOIN campaigns ON advertising_platforms.platform_id = campaigns.platform_id JOIN ads ON campaigns.campaign_id = ads.campaign_id JOIN ad_performance ON ads.ad_id = ad_performance.ad_id WHERE date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM ad_platforms;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_id, date, spend FROM ad_spend WHERE spend > 1000;
SELECT platform_id, date, total_clicks, total_impressions, total_conversions FROM ad_performance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT platform_name, account_id FROM ad_platforms WHERE platform_name LIKE '%Google%';
SELECT platform_name, account_id FROM ad_platforms WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ad_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 AND conversions < 10;
SELECT platform_id, SUM(spend) AS total_spend FROM ad_spend GROUP BY platform_id;
SELECT platform_id, date, total_clicks FROM ad_performance WHERE total_clicks > 500 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
